title: Google Play Store v5.8.8 (Modded) + Installer
description:
With the modded Play Store, you can : Use protected apps with Google LVL (License Verification Library) without cracking them, verify license in offline mode, disable self update, and more.

You need a rooted device to install this.
Please note that you can't download paid apps for free !

Note : If you receive the "Force close" message when you view "Installed" in "My app", please clear cache and data for Google Play Store.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions for 'Google Play Store v5.8.8 (Modded)':


1. Install latest Lucky Patcher
2. Run Lucky Patcher > Menu > Select 'Patch to Android'
3. Select v 'Signature Verify always True' and 'Disable App Signature Verify' > Apply > Yes
4. After reboot go to 'Patch to Android' and check (Patch applied). If applied exit from Lucky patcher. otherwise do 3rd step again.
5. Backup current Google play with Titanium backup in case you want to restore original version.
6. Rename downloaded 'Google Play Store v5.8.8 (Modded).apk' to:
(GingerBread users) -> 'Vending.apk'
(ICS / Jelly Bean users) -> 'PhoneSky.apk'
7. Open Root Explorer and copy/replace renamed apk to '/system/priv-app/Phonesky/' folder.
8. Set permissions to rw-r--r-- (in Root Explorer)
9. Reboot
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
